review: Very Nce doctor .. patient friendly ..listens carefully to entire problem ..and gives the right direction and medication..very humble and polite..

My son had met the doctor and it was for muscle pain related . Consultation went well. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. There was no waiting time in the hospital. Medicines was prescribed by doctor during consultation. X-ray was done. In gym, he had issues in muscles. Doctor spoke well. Hospitality was good. Physiotherapy was suggested. 50 percent his pain is reduced.

** *** ** *********** ** *** *** * **** ********* ***** ***********. 
I visited his clinic for my mom hand pain. That pain has come due to fall on the grass land. He said about fracture and asked operation of cost around ₹50,000 or plaster. I opted plaster. 
The way he did plaster,i don't think that he has done it in good way. Because after removing plaster, pain has started other places too. When we ask solution then he gave pain killer only. **** ******* **** ** **** ***** *** ***** ** ******* ******** ***** **** **** *** ***** ** ******* ****** ** **** ****.

Even i have doubt that, it was the case of major fracture. I feel that I would have not gone to him.

I had been to hospital and it was for knee and heel pain. Consultation was not good by the doctor.  Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. * ***** **** ***** ****** *** **** *** ********* *** *** ******** *** *** I am not satisfied with consultation. There was less waiting time in the hospital when we went. It was for 15 minutes. Physiotherapy was suggested. Later I didn't went to another doctor. *** ****** *** *********

I had met the doctor and it was for leg pain. Doctor was very good in consulting me. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family or friends. He was clam enough to understand problem and gave diagnostics. I am satisfied with the treatment given by the doctor. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. X-ray was done. There was less waiting time in the hospital when we went. It was for 15 minutes. Physiotherapy was suggested in first visit.

I had visited the hospital and it was ortho related. ****** *** **** ** ********** **. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family or friends. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Medical tests were done. I had knee problem. Doctor came late. Doctor was very friendly and hospitality was good.
Scheduled an appointment for 7 45 after visiting the nurse says that the doctor is not available and Practo appointment is not valid.

review: No waiting time immediate relief from pain  he listens to the problem carefully  and treat according to problem.

review:
Wonderful experience !!!

This was my first visit with Dr. Vijayaeswar and I had a very good experience to share. He is very polite and has lot of patience to listen to every information from the patient. He had recommended lab tests that were only necessary to be done and provided genuine medicines for the problem. He is easily reachable through phone and last but not the least the charges are not expensive.

I would highly recommend the Doctor to anyone looking for Orthopedic problems.
good experience, heaving good understanding skills get patient assessment with his knowledge and give good course
